## Functions 

### `load_currency_data(path)`
Loads a processed currency dataset and checks required columns. 

### `convert_currency(amount, from, to, currency_data)`
Converts an amount from one currency to another. 

### `convert_from_reference(amount, ref_currency, currency_data)`
Converts an amount from a reference currency to all other currencies.
